pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/ambitioninc/django-db-mutex.png :target: https://travis-ci.org/ambitioninc/django-db-mutexdjango-db-mutex===============Provides the ability to acquire a mutex lock from the database in Django.Installation------------To install the latest release, type:: pip install django-db-mutexTo install the latest code directly from source, type:: pip install git+git://github.com/ambitioninc/django-db-mutex.gitDocumentation-------------Full documentation is available at http://django-db-mutex.readthedocs.orgLicense-------MIT License (see LICENSE)
